year_business_founded.description: The year the business was founded

estimated_annual_revenue.description:
The estimated amount your company makes in revenue in one year

            #Valid Values
            * '<$1M' - less than $1 million in estimated annual revenue
            * '$1M-$5M' - between $1 million and $5 million in estimated annual revenue
            * '$5M-$10M' - between $5 million and $10 million in estimated annual revenue
            * '$10M-$50M' - between $10 million and $50 million in estimated annual revenue
            * '$50M-$200M' - between $50 million and $200 million in estimated annual revenue
            * '>$200M' - more than $200 million in estimated annual revenue

number_of_skus_in_catalog.description:
Approximate number of SKUs in your product catalog

            #Valid Values
            * '0-499' 
            * '500-4,999',
            * '5,000-19,999',
            * '20,000-49,999'
            * '>50,000'

number_of_fulfillment_nodes.description:
Approximate number of fulfillment nodes you operate

            #Valid Values
            * '0'
            * '1-4'
            * '5-9'
            * '10-19'
            * '20-39'
            * '>40'

number_of_dropshippers.description:
Approximate number of fulfillment nodes you operate

            #Valid Values
            * '0'
            * '1-9'
            * '10-24'
            * '25-49'
            * '50-99'
            * '100-499'
            * '500-999'
            * '>1000'

Approximate number of fulfillment nodes you operate

            #Valid Values
            * '0'
            * '1-9'
            * '10-24'
            * '25-49'
            * '50-99'
            * '100-499'
            * '500-999'
            * '>1000'

live_inventory.description: If true, the merchant can provide live inventory feeds on a per fulfillment center / dropshipper basis

fulfillment_in_us.description: If true, the merchant has fulfillment centers and dropshippers in the US

categories.description: Please enter the categories you sell in (the highest level category nodes -- ##,000,000)

name.description: The name you sell under in a marketplace

marketplace_name.description: The name of the marketplace where you use this name
